item.title: Web Component Icons
item.description: This is the story of pfe-icon, a web component for displaying icons which loads icons on demand and is compatible with any existing set of SVGs. It is part of the PatternFly Elements project. .icon-panel { width: 100%; display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(100px, 1fr)); justify-items: center; } body { --pfe-icon--Color: var(--pbp-fg-color, white); } Demo Red Hat icons: Icon Markup <pfe-icon icon="rh-aed"></pfe-icon> <pfe-icon icon="rh-sun"></pfe-icon> <pfe-icon icon="rh-leaf"></pfe-icon> <pfe-icon icon="rh-puzzle-piece"></pfe-icon> <pfe-icon icon="rh-space-rocket"></pfe-icon> Font Awesome icons:
